Barbacoan (nke a na-akpọkwa Barbakóan, Barbacoano, Barba coana) bụ ezinụlọ asụsụ a na-asụ na Colombia na Ecuador.
Asụsụ Barbacoan nwere ike ịbụ ihe jikọrọ ya na asụsụ Páez

A na-ejikọkarị Barbacoan na asụsụ Paezan (gụnyere Páez); Otú ọ dị, Curnow (afọ nari iri itoolu itoolu na asatọ) na-egosi etu atụmatụ a si dabere na nkọwa na-ezighi ezi nke akwụkwọ ochie nke Douay (nari iri asatọ iri asatọ na asatọ)
